name: one-chain
description: (1) Check CPU architecture ```Shell $ echo %PROCESSOR_ARCHITECTURE% ``` (2) Download and Install the suitable `curl` for CPU architecture ``` $ curl --version ``` (3) Clone `onechain` repository (4) Install `dependencies` in `onechain` repository ```Shell cd onechian npm install ``` (5) Start node ``` npm start ``` (6) Check one-chain version and Terminate node ``` curl http://127.0.0.1:3001/version curl -X POST http://127.0.0.1:3001/stop ```
